name: places/ChIJ_dAT6wpZwokRa6MU0UeuDno
formattedAddress: 301 E 21st St, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 301 E 21st St, New York, NY 10010-6505, USA

originalText.text:
~ No Call / No Show ~

It started out like he was going to help me with my medical conditions. Then, he stopped returning my phone calls. Whether he’s passive-aggressive or just doesn’t want to do his job of psychiatry is beyond my frustration. I would’ve been alright if he just told me he didn’t want me as a patient. Really amazed at this guy’s lack of professionalism.

originalText.text:
WORST. DOCTOR. EVER.
Very frustrating experience. I try not to judge people based on how they act but it's hard not to with this one. One of the worst Doctors. he needs a doctor himself. Can't even refer to him as a doctor since he does not act like one. Very useless and helpless. Stay away from this guy. He is very unprofessional, rude with a very unbearable and  horrible attitude. He's the type of "doctor" that chose this profession for the money, Go somewhere else! Not recommended at all.
I would rate him zero stars if possible. Do yourselves a favor and avoid this place. Terrible!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
